I_D TESTING:
-I COMMANDS
-RS1 = 3
-WRITE 30 ON RS1 (FOR TESTING REGFILE)
-RD  = 1

001001101111 00011 000 10101 0010011  -- 653363859  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000000100 || 11780 ADDI
001001101111 00011 010 10101 0010011  -- 653372051  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111000101100 || 11820 SLTI
001001101111 00011 011 10101 0010011  -- 653376147  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111110101100 || 12204 SLTIU
001001101111 00011 100 10101 0010011  -- 653380243  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111101000100 || 12100 XORI
001001101111 00011 110 10101 0010011  -- 653388435  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111011000100 || 11972 ORI
001001101111 00011 111 10101 0010011  -- 653392531  -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111001000100 || 11844 ANDI
0000000 11001 00011 001 10101 0010011 -- 26319507   -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111011100100 || 12004 SLLI
0000000 11001 00011 101 10101 0010011 -- 26335891   -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111001100100 || 11876 SRLI
0100000 11001 00011 101 10101 0010011 -- 1100077715 -- EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10111101100100 || 12132 SRAI

EXPECTED IMMEDIATE 00000000000000000000001001101111 || 623
EXPECTED JUMPAT    666+623=1289
--
EXPECTED IMMEDIATE2 (FROM SHIFTS) : 25
EXPECTED JUMPAT    666+25 = 691
-- 
EXPECTED IMMEDIATE3 (FROM SRAI) : 1049
EXPECTED JUMPAT    666+1049= 1715

TEST PASSED (I_DTEST_I.vwf)
